languages.text: "Да проблемы со сном в последнее время... А, или ты об этих железяках в моем теле? Понятия не имею. Видимо, в крипте что-то серьезно пошло не так". {n}Голос женщины становится суше и серьезнее.{/n} "Ауспексы зафиксировали какое-то неизвестное излучение, а потом тут все словно взбесилось. Ксеносы передумали тихо спать в своих гробах, начали тут все крушить. А пилон, возле которого я стояла, отрастил дюжину щупалец, и одно из них задело меня. Я отключилась, а когда пришла в себя, то выглядела так, словно попыталась родить шаттл".

"I've been having trouble sleeping lately... Oh, you mean the metal things in my body? I have no idea. Looks like something has gone terribly wrong in the crypt." {n}Her voice becomes more serious and dry.{/n} "The auspexes detected some unknown radiation, and then everything went crazy. The xenos didn't feel like sleeping in their coffins anymore, so they started trashing the place. And the pylon I was standing next to suddenly grew a dozen tentacles, and one of them grazed me. I blacked out, and when I came to, I looked like I'd tried to give birth to a shuttle."
languages.original_text: "Да проблемы со сном в последнее время... А, или ты об этих железяках в моем теле? Понятия не имею. Видимо, в крипте что-то серьезно пошло не так". {n}Голос женщины становится суше и серьезнее.{/n} "Ауспексы зафиксировали какое-то неизвестное излучение, а потом тут все словно взбесилось. Ксеносы передумали тихо спать в своих гробах, начали тут все крушить. А пилон, возле которого я стояла, отрастил дюжину щупалец, и одно из них задело меня. Я отключилась, а когда пришла в себя, то выглядела так, словно попыталась родить шаттл".

traits.locale_text: "I have been having sleep problems lately... Ah, you mean the metal things in my body? I have no idea. Probably something has gone terribly wrong in the crypt." {n}The woman voice becomes more dry and serious.{/n} "The auspex spotted some unknown radiation, and then everything seemed to go haywire. The xenos had decided to rise up from their graves and started thrashing the place. And the pylon that I was standing close to, had suddenly grown a dozen of tentacles and one of them touched me. I blacked out, and when I came to, I looked like I have tried to give birth to a shuttle."

"I have been having sleep problems lately... Ah, you mean the metal things in my body? I have no idea. Probably something has gone terribly wrong in the crypt." {n}The woman voice becomes more dry and serious.{/n} "The auspex spotted some unknown radiation, and then everything seemed to go haywire. The xenos had decided to rise up from their graves and started thrashing the place. And the pylon that I was standing close to, had suddenly grown a dozen of tentacles and one of them touched me. I blacked out, and when I came to, I looked like I have tried to give birth to a shuttle."

"I've been struggling to sleep lately... Oh, you mean the metal things in my body? I have no idea. Looks like something's gone terribly wrong in the crypt." {n}Her voice becomes more serious and dry.{/n} "The auspexes detected some unknown radiation, and then everything went to the hells. The xenos didn't feel like sleeping in their coffins anymore, so they started thrashing the place. And the pylon I was standing next to suddenly grew a dozen tentacles, and one of them grazed me. I blacked out, and when I came to, I looked like I'd tried to give birth to a shuttle."

I blacked out, and when I came to, I looked like I'd tried to give birth to a shuttle."

The xenos didn't feel like sleeping in their coffins anymore, so they started trashing the place. And the pylon I was standing next to suddenly grew a dozen tentacles, and one of them grazed me. I blacked out, and when I came to, I looked like I'd tried to give birth to a shuttle."

Looks like something has gone terribly wrong in the crypt." {n}Her voice becomes more serious and dry.{/n} "The auspexes detected some unknown radiation, and then everything went crazy. The xenos didn't feel like sleeping in their coffins anymore, so they started trashing the place. And the pylon I was standing next to suddenly grew a dozen tentacles, and one of them grazed me. I blacked out, and when I came to, I looked like I'd tried to give birth to a shuttle."

languages.text: «Últimamente me está costando dormir... Ah, ¿se refiere a estos chismes de metal que tengo en el cuerpo? Pues ni idea. Algo ha salido muy mal en la cripta». {n}Su tono se vuelve serio y árido.{/n} «Los aúspex detectaron una radiación desconocida antes de que todo se nos fuera de las manos. A los xenos se les acabaron las ganas de dormir en sus féretros y empezaron a destrozar el local. De la torre que estaba a mi lado salieron varios tentáculos y uno de ellos me rozó. Perdí el conocimiento y, para cuando lo recuperé, parecía que había intentado dar a luz a una lanzadera».
languages.original_text: "I've been having trouble sleeping lately... Oh, you mean the metal things in my body? I have no idea. Looks like something has gone terribly wrong in the crypt." {n}Her voice becomes more serious and dry.{/n} "The auspexes detected some unknown radiation, and then everything went crazy. The xenos didn't feel like sleeping in their coffins anymore, so they started trashing the place. And the pylon I was standing next to suddenly grew a dozen tentacles, and one of them grazed me. I blacked out, and when I came to, I looked like I'd tried to give birth to a shuttle."

traits.locale_text: «Últimamente me está costando dormir... Ah, ¿se refiere a estos chismes de metal que tengo en el cuerpo? Pues ni idea. Algo ha salido muy mal en la cripta». {n}Su tono se vuelve serio y árido.{/n} «Los aúspex detectaron una radiación desconocida antes de que todo se fuera al infierno. A los xenos se les acabaron las ganas de dormir en sus féretros y empezaron a destrozar el local. De la torre que estaba a mi lado salieron varios tentáculos y uno de ellos me rozó. Perdí el conocimiento y, para cuando lo recuperé, parecía que había intentado dar a luz a una lanzadera».

languages.text: « J'ai du mal à dormir ces derniers temps... Oh, vous parlez des morceaux de métal dans mon corps ? Je n'en ai pas la moindre idée. Quelque chose a certainement très mal tourné dans la crypte. » {n}Sa voix se fait soudain plus sèche, plus sérieuse.{/n} « Les auspex ont détecté un type inconnu de radiation, puis tout a viré au cauchemar. Les xénos n'avaient plus envie de dormir dans leurs cercueils, alors ils se sont mis à saccager le site. D'un seul coup, une dizaine de tentacules sont sortis du pylône près duquel je me trouvais et l'un d'eux m'a touchée. J'ai perdu connaissance et lorsque je suis revenue à moi, je ressemblais à un dépôt de ferraille. »
languages.original_text: "I've been having trouble sleeping lately... Oh, you mean the metal things in my body? I have no idea. Looks like something has gone terribly wrong in the crypt." {n}Her voice becomes more serious and dry.{/n} "The auspexes detected some unknown radiation, and then everything went crazy. The xenos didn't feel like sleeping in their coffins anymore, so they started trashing the place. And the pylon I was standing next to suddenly grew a dozen tentacles, and one of them grazed me. I blacked out, and when I came to, I looked like I'd tried to give birth to a shuttle."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai du mal à dormir, ces derniers temps... Oh, vous parlez des morceaux de métal dans mon corps ? Je n'en ai pas la moindre idée. Quelque chose a certainement très mal tourné dans la crypte. » {n}Sa voix se fait soudain plus sèche, plus sérieuse.{/n} « Les auspex ont détecté un type inconnu de radiation, puis tout a viré au cauchemar. Les xénos n'avaient plus envie de dormir dans leurs cercueils, alors ils se sont mis à saccager le site. D'un seul coup, une dizaine de tentacules sont sortis du pylône près duquel je me trouvais et l'un d'eux m'a touchée. J'ai perdu connaissance et lorsque je suis revenue à moi, je ressemblais à un dépôt de ferraille. »

languages.text: 「最近は全然眠れてないんだ…ああ、体内の金属のこと？分からないな。どうも地下室で非常にまずいことが起きたらしい」{n}彼女の声はさらに真剣で冷淡なものになる。{/n}「アウスペクスが未知の放射を感知して、それから全てが狂ってしまったんだ。異種族たちはもう棺の中で眠ってるのが嫌になったみたいで、その場を荒らしはじめた。で、横に立ってた鉄塔から突然たくさん触手が生えてきて、その一本に食われたんだ。気を失って、戻ったときにはシャトルを出産するかのような格好になってたってわけ」
languages.original_text: "I've been having trouble sleeping lately... Oh, you mean the metal things in my body? I have no idea. Looks like something has gone terribly wrong in the crypt." {n}Her voice becomes more serious and dry.{/n} "The auspexes detected some unknown radiation, and then everything went crazy. The xenos didn't feel like sleeping in their coffins anymore, so they started trashing the place. And the pylon I was standing next to suddenly grew a dozen tentacles, and one of them grazed me. I blacked out, and when I came to, I looked like I'd tried to give birth to a shuttle."

traits.locale_text: 「最近は全然眠れてないんだ…ああ、体内の金属のこと？分からないな。どうも地下室で非常にまずいことが起きたらしい」{n}彼女の声はさらに真剣で冷淡なものになる。{/n}「アウスペクスが未知の放射を感知して、それから全てが狂ってしまったんだ。異種族たちはもう棺の中で眠ってるのが嫌になったみたいで、その場を荒らしはじめた。で、横に立ってた鉄塔から突然たくさん触手が生えてきて、その一本に食われたんだ。気を失って、戻ったときにはシャトルを出産するかのような格好になってたってわけ」

languages.text: “我最近一直都睡不好觉……噢，你是说我身体里的这堆金属吗？我也不知道，看起来像是这座墓穴出了大麻烦。”{n}我她的声音变得更加严肃，更加生涩。{/n}“扫描仪器探测到了某种未知的辐射，然后一切就都乱套了。那些异形不再好好地呆在棺材里，突然跑到这个地方到处乱窜。当时，我旁边的动力塔突然伸出了几十条触手，其中一条打到了我，把我一下子打晕了。等我醒过来之后，就变成这样了，看起来就像是准备生出一艘穿梭机一样。”
languages.original_text: "I've been having trouble sleeping lately... Oh, you mean the metal things in my body? I have no idea. Looks like something has gone terribly wrong in the crypt." {n}Her voice becomes more serious and dry.{/n} "The auspexes detected some unknown radiation, and then everything went crazy. The xenos didn't feel like sleeping in their coffins anymore, so they started trashing the place. And the pylon I was standing next to suddenly grew a dozen tentacles, and one of them grazed me. I blacked out, and when I came to, I looked like I'd tried to give birth to a shuttle."

traits.locale_text: “我最近一直都睡不好觉……噢，你是说我身体里的这堆金属吗？我也不知道，看起来像是这座墓穴出了大麻烦。”{n}我她的声音变得更加严肃，更加生涩。{/n}“扫描仪器探测到了某种未知的辐射，然后一切就都乱套了。那些异形不再好好地呆在棺材里，突然跑到这个地方到处乱窜。当时，我旁边的动力塔突然伸出了几十条触手，其中一条打到了我，把我一下子打晕了。等我醒过来之后，就变成这样了，看起来就像是准备生出一艘穿梭机一样。”

languages.text: "Ich schlafe in letzter Zeit nicht gut ... Ach, Ihr meint die Metalldinger in meinem Körper? Ich habe keinen Schimmer. Es scheint, als wäre in der Krypta etwas fürchterlich schiefgegangen." {n}Ihre Stimme wird ernster, trockener.{/n} "Die Auspizien haben eine unbekannte Strahlung entdeckt, und dann ist die Wahnsinn losgebrochen. Den Xenos war nicht mehr danach, in ihren Särgen zu schlafen, also haben sie angefangen, alles zu zerstören. Und dem Mast neben mir sind plötzlich ein Dutzend Tentakel gewachsen, und eines davon hat mich gestreift. Ich habe das Bewusstsein verloren, und als ich wieder zu mir gekommen bin, sah ich aus, als hätte ich versucht, ein Shuttle zu gebären."
languages.original_text: "I've been having trouble sleeping lately... Oh, you mean the metal things in my body? I have no idea. Looks like something has gone terribly wrong in the crypt." {n}Her voice becomes more serious and dry.{/n} "The auspexes detected some unknown radiation, and then everything went crazy. The xenos didn't feel like sleeping in their coffins anymore, so they started trashing the place. And the pylon I was standing next to suddenly grew a dozen tentacles, and one of them grazed me. I blacked out, and when I came to, I looked like I'd tried to give birth to a shuttle."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schlafe in letzter Zeit nicht gut ... Ach, Ihr meint die Metalldinger in meinem Körper? Ich habe keinen Schimmer. Es scheint, als wäre in der Krypta etwas fürchterlich schiefgegangen." {n}Ihre Stimme wird ernster, trockener.{/n} "Die Auspizien haben eine unbekannte Strahlung entdeckt, und dann ist die Hölle losgebrochen. Den Xenos war nicht mehr danach, in ihren Särgen zu schlafen, also haben sie angefangen, alles zu zerstören. Und dem Mast neben mir sind plötzlich ein Dutzend Tentakel gewachsen, und eines davon hat mich gestreift. Ich habe das Bewusstsein verloren, und als ich wieder zu mir gekommen bin, sah ich aus, als hätte ich versucht, ein Shuttle zu gebären."

languages.text: "Son zamanlarda uyku problemi çekiyorum... Ha, bedenimdeki metalleri mi diyorsun? Hiçbir fikrim yok. Sanırım mahzende çok kötü bir şey olmuş." {n}Ses tonu ciddileşiyor.{/n} "Uzgörenler, bilinmeyen bir radyasyon algıladı ve her şey birbirine girdi. Zenolar tabutlarında uyumayı reddedince ortalığı birbirine katmaya başladı. Yanında dikildiğim sütun; aniden dokunaçlar çıkardı, onlardan biri de beni sıyırdı geçti. Bayılmışım. Kendime geldiğimde mekik doğurmuş gibiydim."
languages.original_text: "I've been having trouble sleeping lately... Oh, you mean the metal things in my body? I have no idea. Looks like something has gone terribly wrong in the crypt." {n}Her voice becomes more serious and dry.{/n} "The auspexes detected some unknown radiation, and then everything went crazy. The xenos didn't feel like sleeping in their coffins anymore, so they started trashing the place. And the pylon I was standing next to suddenly grew a dozen tentacles, and one of them grazed me. I blacked out, and when I came to, I looked like I'd tried to give birth to a shuttle."
